name: Kill the Cucumber
description:
My first real world project

A little prototype made with Nez Framework based on MonoGame

Basically you need to kill the Green Cucumber and thats it, This project was made for learning purposes only, I used commercial sprites by (I'll link sprite creator later), Hope you will appreciate the smooth gameplay and not another unity game(no hate).

I might add in a multiplayer support so you can battle your friends and make a build for Andorid later for iOS.

video demonstrating the gameplay:

https://i.gyazo.com/354a7455898a4e00d7c9c7b9bd847a7d.mp4

Special Thanks:

prime31 - Nez creator,  pretty much self explanatory :D

Witlock - collision, answered alot of my questions regarding Nez

bvs - collision extension

skibum3d - answered different question I had
